metadata.title: Prestige International Rejuvenating Plus Set
features: Effective January 21, 2021: Due to high volume demand of Prestige Intenational products, we are facing shortage of the production of the original jar. That is why we temporarily decided to use a different smaller cream jar. Size is smaller but still contain 10g. This is to ssure a continuos supply of Prestige International Products. - Prestige International Main Office
You may receive a set with the original jars or the temporary jars depending on stock availablity.
description: PLEASE NOTE THAT the packaging appearance of the item may not be exactly the same as shown in the pictures as the manufacturer may change the look of the packaging every now and then; but rest assured item is authentic and are the same.

Before use, perform a SPOT TEST to test for sensitivity as follows: Apply or rub products to a patch of skin on the inner, lower arm. Rub it in and allow it to dry on the skin. Do not wash that area of the skin for at least 24 hours; watch for signs of reaction. If rash, burning, tingling, or inflammation occur, immediately remove the product from skin and discontinue all further use.
WE DO NOT GUARANTEE RESULTS. RESULTS AND SKIN REACTIONS VARY FROM PERSON TO PERSON.

title: Brilliant sunblock sachet  anti aging formula
